content_i18n.en: ## Penguin Statistics will be exhibiting at C105 Penguin Statistics will be exhibiting at C105! Our booth is at 「**東v-21ab**」on the first day of C105 (December 29th). Welcome to visit our booth and feel free to grab our **free** postcard as special benefit for visitors. This time, we've used a new process to produce the 5th-anniversary commemorative goods, and there have been many updates to the goods from the "Rhode Island Base BETA" collaboration as well. All incomes from C105 will continue to be used to cover daily expenses such as server costs for Penguin Statistics website.
content_i18n.ja: ## ペン急データ C105 出展 ペン急データはC105も出展いたします！今回も「C105来場特典ポストカード」を**無料配布**しますので、ぜひ**「1日目　東v-21ab」**まで遊びに来てね！今回は記念図を用いて制作した缶バッジとアクスタの品質を向上させました。「ロドス・アイランド基地BETA」とのコラボ商品も更新されています。 ※今回C105のすべての収益も、ペン急データサイトの運営費用として、大事に使わせていただきます。
content_i18n.ko: ## Penguin Statistics will be exhibiting at C105 Penguin Statistics will be exhibiting at C105! Our booth is at 「**東v-21ab**」on the first day of C105 (December 29th). Welcome to visit our booth and feel free to grab our **free** postcard as special benefit for visitors. This time, we've used a new process to produce the 5th-anniversary commemorative goods, and there have been many updates to the goods from the "Rhode Island Base BETA" collaboration as well. All incomes from C105 will continue to be used to cover daily expenses such as server costs for Penguin Statistics website.
content_i18n.zh: ## 企鹅物流 C105 参展 企鹅物流将参展 C105！我们的摊位在「**一日目 東v-21ab**」，欢迎大家来领取**免费的**「企鹅物流 C105 特典明信片」！ 这次我们使用新工艺制作了5周年纪念图的谷子，「罗德岛基建BETA」的合作谷子也有很多更新。欢迎大家12月29日来找我们玩！C105 的所有收益将继续作为企鹅物流的网站收入，用以服务器等的日常开销！

content_i18n.en:
Follow us on Twitter at [@penguin_stats](https://twitter.com/penguin_stats).
Download the official App at [App Store](https://apps.apple.com/app/apple-store/id1533665292?pt=122166281&ct=web:en&mt=8)
content_i18n.ja:
右上のスイッチャーを使用してサーバーを切り替えることができます。
公式Twitterはじめました。リツイート＆フォローをよろしくお願いいたします：[@penguin_stats](https://twitter.com/penguin_stats)
content_i18n.ko:
You can switch server using the switcher at the top-right corner.
Follow us on Twitter at [@penguin_stats](https://twitter.com/penguin_stats)
content_i18n.zh:
企鹅物流数据统计官方 iOS App 已正式上线！[前往 App Store 下载](https://apps.apple.com/app/apple-store/id1533665292?pt=122166281&ct=web:zh&mt=8)
若您在使用中遇到问题，可通过首页右下的客服系统联系我们。
